dict.acceptation: 染上（恶习，疾病等）；缩小，紧缩；
契约；婚约；[法]契约法；行贿；

sent.orig: Design by Contract (DBC) is mentioned by Betrand Meyer.
sent.trans: 基于契约式设计(Design By Contract,DBC)这一理论是由Betrand Meyer提出的。

sent.orig: The parties may a contract by referencing a model contract for the relevant contract category.
sent.trans: 当事人可以参照各类合同的示范文本订立合同。

sent.orig: The author considers that object of futures contract is futures and futures contract is a contract.
sent.trans: 笔者认为，期货合同标的是期货商品，期货合同为交易者之间的一种协议。

sent.orig: Furthermore, combines the buy-back contract with option contract, establishes a new kind of contract with option.
sent.trans: 构建了嵌入式期权下单周期两级供应链中的单向看涨期权柔性契约、双向期权柔性契约模型。

sent.orig: Railroad freight loses contract, labor contract and collective contract, not applicable this method.
sent.trans: 铁路客货运输合同、劳动合同和集体合同，不适用本办法。
